name: Vacuum cleaner robot simulator: pile sos edition
name_original: Vacuum cleaner robot simulator: pile sos edition
description:
In the game you control a robot vacuum cleaner! You have to avoid collision with different obstacles in order not to break down and reach the very end!
The goal of the game is simple, you need to clean up, but if you do not clean up well, then you will run out of all energy and you will lose.
The further you advance, the more difficult the obstacles will be!

Features of the game:
- Beautiful graphics
- Dynamic gameplay
- Pleasant music
- Complexity

your obstacles will be everything, even someone spilled nasty things. You will be in 2D watching the most epic hero exploits. The machines have won!
